${ModID}:AcidProjector.NAME: A.C.I.D Projector
${ModID}:AcidProjector.DESCRIPTION: The enemy takes double damage from Attacks this turn. NL 消耗 。

${ModID}:ElectricWhip.NAME: Electric Whip
${ModID}:ElectricWhip.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Channel 1 Lightning.

${ModID}:EnrageShot.NAME: Enrage Shot
${ModID}:EnrageShot.DESCRIPTION: Stun the enemy and apply 2 Strength. NL 消耗 。

${ModID}:MercuryFist.NAME: Mercury Fist
${ModID}:MercuryFist.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL 消耗 。

${ModID}:ReboundVolley.NAME: Rebound Volley
${ModID}:ReboundVolley.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL Deal !${ModID}:sd! damage to a random enemy.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL Deal !${ModID}:sd! damage to a random enemy !M! times.

${ModID}:SmokePellets.NAME: Smoke Pellets
${ModID}:SmokePellets.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL Apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:SmolderingShell.NAME: Smoldering Shell
${ModID}:SmolderingShell.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Apply !${ModID}:m2! Weak to ALL other enemies.

${ModID}:SpartanShield.NAME: Spartan Shield
${ModID}:SpartanShield.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL Gain !M! Temporary Strength.

${ModID}:StormGenerator.NAME: Storm Generator
${ModID}:StormGenerator.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, Channel !M! Lightning for each enemy that has a debuff.

${ModID}:VoidShocker.NAME: Void Shocker
${ModID}:VoidShocker.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an enemy deals only blocked damage, deal !M! damage to it.
